till a lot later, huh, Darla?

248
00:25:15,435 --> 00:25:19,462
She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

249
00:25:19,539 --> 00:25:21,871
l don't have any dolls.

250
00:25:21,942 --> 00:25:25,309
Get some food, huh?

251
00:25:25,379 --> 00:25:28,371
Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

252
00:25:34,054 --> 00:25:37,751
- ''Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.''
- [ Laughing ]

253
00:25:47,768 --> 00:25:50,999
Thirty, forty dollars.

254
00:25:52,773 --> 00:25:55,207
Who the fuck is this now?

255
00:25:55,275 --> 00:25:59,439
Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

256
00:25:59,513 --> 00:26:02,175
- Cerrado!
- [ Pounding ]

257
00:26:02,249 --> 00:26:06,083
Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

258
00:26:11,591 --> 00:26:13,616
[ Muttering ]

259
00:26:13,693 --> 00:26:17,959
Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

260
00:26:19,666 --> 00:26:21,395
Hey! Hey!

261
00:26:23,437 --> 00:26:25,530
- [ Cawing ]
- [ Screams ]

262
00:26:25,605 --> 00:26:29,974
''Suddenly l heard
a tapping, as if someone...

263
00:26:30,043 --> 00:26:33,979
gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door.''

264
00:26:35,949 --> 00:26:38,247
What are you talking about?

265
00:26:38,318 --> 00:26:41,048
You heard me rapping, right?

266
00:26:41,121 --> 00:26:45,251
You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

267
00:26:47,661 --> 00:26:50,653
l'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

268
00:26:50,730 --> 00:26:52,095
Gold.

269
00:26:52,165 --> 00:26:54,497
You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

270
00:26:58,772 --> 00:27:03,903
Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

271
00:27:03,977 --> 00:27:06,502
Shit on me.
Shit on me!

272
00:27:12,652 --> 00:27:14,916
- Aaah!
- Mr. Gideon.

273
00:27:14,988 --> 00:27:17,252
You're not paying attention.

274
00:27:20,160 --> 00:27:22,321
No! [ Screaming ]

275
00:27:22,395 --> 00:27:27,697
l repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

276
00:27:29,336 --> 00:27:32,794
lt was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

277
00:27:35,509 --> 00:27:39,172
He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

278
00:27:39,246 --> 00:27:42,409
[ Helicopter Departing ]

279
00:27:44,484 --> 00:27:46,475
Who's this sack of shit?

280
00:27:46,553 --> 00:27:49,522
That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

281
00:27:49,589 --> 00:27:52,649
l think you can rule out
accidental death.

282
00:27:52,726 --> 00:27:55,524
Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

283
00:27:55,595 --> 00:27:59,759
This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

284
00:27:59,833 --> 00:28:04,566
Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

285
00:28:04,638 --> 00:28:06,572
l'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

286
00:28:06,640 --> 00:28:10,406
Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

287
00:28:11,611 --> 00:28:14,011
What the hell
do you call that?

288
00:28:15,081 --> 00:28:17,675
l call it blood, detective.

289
00:28:17,751 --> 00:28:21,517
l suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

290
00:28:21,588 --> 00:28:24,352
You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

291
00:28:24,424 --> 00:28:28,417
[ Helicopter Approaching ]

292
00:28:31,099 --> 00:28:34,000
- Warmer?
- What are you doing?

293
00:28:34,069 --> 00:28:36,697
- Don't you know this game?
- What game?

294
00:28:36,772 --> 00:28:39,673
Okay, the rings!
l'll tell you about the rings!

295
00:28:39,741 --> 00:28:44,144
They're in that metal box!
lt's under the shelf there!

296
00:28:44,213 --> 00:28:49,742
Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

297
00:28:53,322 --> 00:28:55,916
- Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

298
00:29:05,067 --> 00:29:07,092
No, no.

299
00:29:07,169 --> 00:29:10,297
No, no, no.

300
00:29:12,774 --> 00:29:17,006
Oh, it's beautiful.
l don't believe it.

301
00:29:20,916 --> 00:29:23,282
Shelly.

302
00:29:31,460 --> 00:29:32,859
l love you.

303
00:29:37,933 --> 00:29:40,800
[ Groaning ]

304
00:29:40,869 --> 00:29:43,804
- You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

305
00:29:43,872 --> 00:29:46,966
- Thank you.
- Take anything!

306
00:29:47,042 --> 00:29:49,909
Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

307
00:29:49,978 --> 00:29:52,606
the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

308
00:29:52,681 --> 00:29:55,081
The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

309
00:29:55,150 --> 00:30:00,247
T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

310
00:30:00,322 --> 00:30:03,314
- Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

311
00:30:03,392 --> 00:30:07,158
- A whole jolly club...
- Please!

312
00:30:07,229 --> 00:30:09,993
- with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

313
00:30:10,065 --> 00:30:12,727
- Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!

314
00:30:14,403 --> 00:30:17,804
Each one of these is a life...

315
00:30:17,873 --> 00:30:20,398
a life you helped destroy.

316
00:30:20,475 --> 00:30:23,069
l'm begging you.
Don't kill me.

317
00:30:23,145 --> 00:30:26,842
l'm not gonna kill you.

318
00:30:26,915 --> 00:30:31,079
Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

319
00:30:31,153 --> 00:30:34,680
tonight.

320
00:30:39,728 --> 00:30:43,926
Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

321
00:30:45,834 --> 00:30:49,895
You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

322
00:30:49,971 --> 00:30:53,600
You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

323
00:30:53,675 --> 00:30:55,836
ls that gasoline l smell?

324
00:30:55,911 --> 00:30:58,846
No, man, no!
No!

325
00:30:58,914 --> 00:31:00,973
No!

326
00:31:01,049 --> 00:31:02,380
No!

327
00:31:05,420 --> 00:31:08,048
[ Screaming ]

328
00:31:11,360 --> 00:31:16,229
[ Screaming ]

329
00:31:18,066 --> 00:31:21,524
lt's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

330
00:31:21,603 --> 00:31:23,867
One root beer.

331
00:31:25,907 --> 00:31:28,637
[ Bartender ] l can't do anything.

332
00:31:28,710 --> 00:31:33,170
Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

333
00:31:33,248 --> 00:31:35,375
Yeah, way off.

334
00:31:36,551 --> 00:31:39,918
[ Tires Screeching, Door Opening ]

335
00:31:39,988 --> 00:31:44,891
Police! Don't move!
l said, ''Don't move!''

336
00:31:44,960 --> 00:31:47,986
l thought the police
always said, ''Freeze!''

337
00:31:48,063 --> 00:31:51,999
l am the police and l say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.

338
00:31:52,067 --> 00:31:57,232
And l say l'm dead and l move.

339
00:31:57,305 --> 00:32:00,604
Not one more step.
l'm serious.

340
00:32:00,675 --> 00:32:05,044
Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

341
00:32:05,113 --> 00:32:08,241
What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

342
00:32:08,316 --> 00:32:10,045
You high?

343
00:32:10,118 --> 00:32:13,315
- You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

344
00:32:13,388 --> 00:32:17,381
How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

345
00:32:17,459 --> 00:32:20,121
Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

346
00:32:20,195 --> 00:32:24,791
l want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

347
00:32:24,866 --> 00:32:29,701
Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

348
00:32:29,771 --> 00:32:34,231
- lt's gettin' too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.

349
00:32:34,309 --> 00:32:36,743
Do you know someone named T-bird?

350
00:32:36,812 --> 00:32:41,408
He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

351
00:32:41,483 --> 00:32:44,077
You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

352
00:32:44,152 --> 00:32:47,644
- [ Looter ] Check it out.
- He was already dead.

353
00:32:47,722 --> 00:32:53,092
- [ Glass Shattering ]
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

354
00:32:53,161 --> 00:32:56,824
They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

355
00:32:56,898 --> 00:32:59,332
Get away from there!

356
00:32:59,401 --> 00:33:02,529
Cops!
Get outta here!

357
00:33:02,604 --> 00:33:06,005
- [ Woman Laughing ]
- [ Looter ] Leave it, run!

358
00:33:11,379 --> 00:33:15,713
- Oh, great, great.
- [ Siren Wailing ]

359
00:33:15,784 --> 00:33:18,378
Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

360
00:33:18,453 --> 00:33:20,785
and you lose him
right out in the open.

361
00:33:20,856 --> 00:33:26,692
Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. l hate that.

362
00:33:26,761 --> 00:33:30,697
Little early
for Devil's Night.

363
00:33:32,267 --> 00:33:34,997
You are very restless.

364
00:33:35,070 --> 00:33:38,301
Just wish l was a little
hungry again, that's all.

365
00:33:38,373 --> 00:33:42,605
- Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, l may get it, l know.

366
00:33:46,214 --> 00:33:48,808
[ Sizzling ]

367
00:33:48,884 --> 00:33:52,479
** [ Rock And Roll, lndistinct ]

368
00:33:54,089 --> 00:33:57,115
There are energies
aligning against you.

369
00:33:57,192 --> 00:33:59,660
Seeing is believing,
isn't it?

370
00:34:06,601 --> 00:34:10,401
[ Door Opening, Closing ]

371
00:34:10,472 --> 00:34:13,464
Mmm, yummy.

372
00:34:18,813 --> 00:34:22,772
Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

373
00:34:22,851 --> 00:34:26,082
Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

374
00:34:26,154 --> 00:34:27,917
l didn't have nothing
to do with that.

375
00:34:27,989 --> 00:34:30,651
[ Man ] You must be
awfully disappointed.

376
00:34:30,725 --> 00:34:34,058
l got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

377
00:34:34,129 --> 00:34:36,427
- Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

378
00:34:36,498 --> 00:34:41,060
Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

379
00:34:41,136 --> 00:34:43,696
Gentlemen, by all means,
l think we ought to have...

380
00:34:43,772 --> 00:34:46,969
an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

381
00:34:49,644 --> 00:34:52,204
You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

382
00:34:52,280 --> 00:34:55,078
- Whatever you say, l can do.
- Good.

383
00:34:55,150 --> 00:34:57,948
That's very reassuring.

384
00:34:58,019 --> 00:35:02,046
l still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

385
00:35:02,123 --> 00:35:06,583
ls that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?

386
00:35:06,661 --> 00:35:08,526
Call it my need to know.

387
00:35:35,457 --> 00:35:37,322
[ Sighing ]

388
00:35:39,527 --> 00:35:42,052
[ Honking, Tires Screeching ]

389
00:35:42,130 --> 00:35:44,724
Let go, you creep!

390
00:35:48,036 --> 00:35:49,799
- Nah.
- [ Laughing ]

391
00:35:49,871 --> 00:35:53,170
You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

392
00:35:54,576 --> 00:35:56,976
He couldn't have stopped.

393
00:35:57,045 --> 00:36:01,345
He was a buttface.
l could have made it.

394
00:36:01,416 --> 00:36:04,476
What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

395
00:36:04,552 --> 00:36:06,543
Sometimes.

396
00:36:08,623 --> 00:36:13,356
lt's more like surfing than skating.
l wish the rain would stop, just once.

397
00:36:14,529 --> 00:36:18,021
- lt can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

398
00:36:27,356 --> 00:36:30,484
[ Phone Ringing ]

399
00:36:34,964 --> 00:36:39,560
Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

400
00:36:39,635 --> 00:36:43,969
Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

401
00:36:44,040 --> 00:36:47,476
Annie... look at that.

402
00:36:47,543 --> 00:36:51,775
''We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--''

403
00:36:51,848 --> 00:36:53,907
What is this, a petition?

404
00:36:53,983 --> 00:36:56,850
Big ''kick me'' sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

405
00:36:56,919 --> 00:37:01,015
- The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

406
00:37:01,090 --> 00:37:06,995
Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

407
00:37:07,063 --> 00:37:10,624
The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

408
00:37:10,700 --> 00:37:14,693
- l know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- l bet he does.

409
00:37:21,711 --> 00:37:25,442
You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

410
00:37:25,515 --> 00:37:27,642
l'm cool.

411
00:37:27,717 --> 00:37:32,450
You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

412
00:37:32,522 --> 00:37:35,013
Ah, l owe you one!

413
00:37:35,091 --> 00:37:37,116
Yeah, right.

414
00:37:37,193 --> 00:37:39,354
Damn.

415
00:37:52,942 --> 00:37:56,400
** [ Rock And Roll ]

416
00:38:04,787 --> 00:38:08,655
Tomorrow night
we can get high...

417
00:38:08,724 --> 00:38:12,421
and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

418
00:38:15,264 --> 00:38:18,392
- * l am the park *
- [ Caws ]

419
00:38:18,467 --> 00:38:22,096
* l am glow *

420
00:38:22,171 --> 00:38:26,232
* ln the motherfuckin' dark *

421
00:38:26,309 --> 00:38:28,470
* l am shocked *

422
00:38:28,544 --> 00:38:30,774
* And l see *

423
00:38:30,846 --> 00:38:34,009
* l don't want to believe *

424
00:38:34,083 --> 00:38:37,211
* No more *

425
00:38:37,286 --> 00:38:39,914
- There's a big fuckin' bird over there.
- * No more **

426
00:38:39,989 --> 00:38:41,957
- Huh?
- [ Cawing ]

427
00:38:43,125 --> 00:38:46,026
- lt's a squab.
- [ Laughing ]

428
00:38:46,095 --> 00:38:48,723
Come here, bird.

429
00:38:48,798 --> 00:38:50,891
Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.

430
00:38:50,967 --> 00:38:53,299
Bird. B-B-Birdie.

431
00:38:53,369 --> 00:38:55,963
Here, birdie, birdie.

432
00:38:56,038 --> 00:38:59,030
Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.

433
00:39:01,644 --> 00:39:04,875
Birdie? Hey, birdie?

434
00:39:04,947 --> 00:39:07,541
Here, Funboy.

435
00:39:09,852 --> 00:39:11,820
What the fuck?

436
00:39:15,625 --> 00:39:18,150
[ Strumming Guitar ]

437
00:39:18,227 --> 00:39:22,755
No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

438
00:39:22,832 --> 00:39:24,993
Look at him.

439
00:39:25,067 --> 00:39:27,934
[ Funboy ] Don't sweat it.

440
00:39:29,639 --> 00:39:32,665
lt's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

441
00:39:40,583 --> 00:39:45,418
Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

442
00:39:47,423 --> 00:39:52,360
You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?

443
00:39:52,428 --> 00:39:55,955
You need professional help.

444
00:39:57,733 --> 00:40:00,327
- [ Groaning ]
- Bingo!

445
00:40:00,403 --> 00:40:03,031
He shoots! He scores!

446
00:40:05,207 --> 00:40:08,199
- [ Cawing ]
- [ Laughing ]

447
00:40:09,545 --> 00:40:13,106
[ Cheering, Laughing ]

448
00:40:13,182 --> 00:40:16,879
- Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?

449
00:40:16,952 --> 00:40:19,682
Stop me if you heard this one.

450
00:40:19,755 --> 00:40:22,690
Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

451
00:40:22,758 --> 00:40:24,692
[ Whimpering ]

452
00:40:24,760 --> 00:40:26,557
Ow.

453
00:40:28,097 --> 00:40:30,861
He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...

454
00:40:30,933 --> 00:40:34,494
Don't you ever fuckin' die?

455
00:40:34,570 --> 00:40:36,800
''Can you put me up for the night?''

456
00:40:36,872 --> 00:40:40,364
[ Groaning ]

457
00:40:42,311 --> 00:40:46,907
- Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

458
00:40:46,982 --> 00:40:49,041
Oh, God.

459
00:40:49,118 --> 00:40:53,214
Look what you've done
to my sheets.

460
00:40:55,124 --> 00:40:56,751
[ Gun Uncocking ]

461
00:41:03,165 --> 00:41:04,928
[ Crying ]

462
00:41:05,000 --> 00:41:08,561
[ Sobbing ]

463
00:41:17,446 --> 00:41:19,414
l've got a gun
in my pocket.

464
00:41:22,451 --> 00:41:25,181
You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

465
00:41:42,938 --> 00:41:46,806
Stay away!
Stay away from me!

466
00:41:48,277 --> 00:41:50,541
[ Screaming ]

467
00:41:54,683 --> 00:41:58,483
Look.

468
00:41:58,554 --> 00:42:03,048
Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

469
00:42:03,125 --> 00:42:07,892
Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

470
00:42:18,303 --> 00:42:23,104
Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

471
00:42:52,871 --> 00:42:56,534
lf l wanted ice,
l would have asked for ice!

472
00:42:56,608 --> 00:42:58,872
Now fill it up!

473
00:42:59,978 --> 00:43:03,345
Fill it up yourself, macho man.

474
00:43:03,415 --> 00:43:06,111
l really need this.

475
00:43:12,658 --> 00:43:14,626
All right.

476
00:43:14,693 --> 00:43:18,629
You burn yourself
playing with matches?

477
00:43:18,697 --> 00:43:21,291
- Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

478
00:43:21,366 --> 00:43:23,834
- Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

479
00:43:23,902 --> 00:43:26,837
This is a first.
Do l bow or do l curtsy?

480
00:43:26,905 --> 00:43:29,703
Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

481
00:43:29,775 --> 00:43:33,211
Oh! Hey, hey, hon!

482
00:43:33,278 --> 00:43:36,179
Hey, good night, Darla.

483
00:43:38,617 --> 00:43:42,314
- You stay put right there.
- [ Groaning ]

484
00:43:50,395 --> 00:43:53,853
Get away, steamhead.

485
00:44:10,415 --> 00:44:13,009
[ Groaning ]

486
00:44:13,085 --> 00:44:15,053
Shh.

487
00:44:24,997 --> 00:44:30,731
[ Man On Radio ] As you can see, l'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

488
00:44:30,802 --> 00:44:33,532
- [ Door Squeaking ]
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

489
00:44:33,605 --> 00:44:36,597
lt was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

490
00:44:36,675 --> 00:44:39,610
across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

491
00:44:39,678 --> 00:44:41,839
The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

492
00:44:41,914 --> 00:44:44,041
but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

493
00:44:44,116 --> 00:44:48,883
ln fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--

494
00:44:48,954 --> 00:44:51,889
Freeze!

495
00:44:51,957 --> 00:44:55,449
Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

496
00:44:55,527 --> 00:44:57,495
[ Whispering ] Fuck.

497
00:44:59,464 --> 00:45:01,659
Good likeness.

498
00:45:01,733 --> 00:45:05,430
l saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.

499
00:45:05,504 --> 00:45:07,768
You still have your hat on.

500
00:45:11,677 --> 00:45:13,770
l gotta sit down.

501
00:45:14,579 --> 00:45:16,513
Shi--

502
00:45:16,581 --> 00:45:19,448
[ Albrecht ] Holy Shit.

503
00:45:20,886 --> 00:45:23,548
Say...

504
00:45:23,622 --> 00:45:27,922
are you some kind of... ghost?

505
00:45:27,993 --> 00:45:29,961
Boo!

506
00:45:37,536 --> 00:45:42,098
l don't know what l am. l need you
to tell me what happened to us.

507
00:45:44,109 --> 00:45:48,170
You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.

508
00:45:48,246 --> 00:45:51,340
She, ah, was beaten and raped.

509
00:45:51,416 --> 00:45:56,012
Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

510
00:45:56,088 --> 00:45:58,716
Come on. Read the file.

511
00:45:58,790 --> 00:46:03,159
Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.

512
00:46:03,228 --> 00:46:06,425
Her body finally just gave it up.

513
00:46:06,498 --> 00:46:10,366
l saw it.
l couldn't do jack for her.

514
00:46:20,245 --> 00:46:22,179
- Hey.
- Don't touch me!

515
00:46:22,247 --> 00:46:26,240
- [ Sobbing ]
- Hey.

516
00:46:27,652 --> 00:46:30,485
You okay?

517
00:46:30,555 --> 00:46:33,251
l saw her.

518
00:46:34,893 --> 00:46:38,192
l saw her
through your eyes.

519
00:46:38,263 --> 00:46:40,356
You stayed with her
the whole time.

520
00:46:40,432 --> 00:46:45,893
Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

521
00:46:45,971 --> 00:46:50,704
l was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

522
00:46:50,776 --> 00:46:53,711
Give me something
l could work with.

523
00:46:53,779 --> 00:46:56,009
Yeah.

524
00:46:56,081 --> 00:46:58,515
Look, l--

525
00:46:58,583 --> 00:47:01,074
Why didn't you do
something about it?

526
00:47:01,153 --> 00:47:04,486
You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

527
00:47:04,556 --> 00:47:08,014
would talk after
what happened to you?

528
00:47:08,093 --> 00:47:11,324
l kept asking
questions and...

529
00:47:11,396 --> 00:47:14,058
finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

530
00:47:18,070 --> 00:47:20,038
This your wife?

531
00:47:20,105 --> 00:47:24,599
Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

532
00:47:26,445 --> 00:47:29,414
lt's funny.

533
00:47:29,481 --> 00:47:33,474
Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

534
00:47:33,552 --> 00:47:37,044
l used to think
they were kind of trivial.

535
00:47:37,122 --> 00:47:40,148
Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

536
00:47:49,768 --> 00:47:54,228
You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

537
00:47:58,910 --> 00:48:02,107
You going to vanish
into thin air again?

538
00:48:05,750 --> 00:48:08,446
l thought l'd use
your front door.

539
00:48:11,490 --> 00:48:17,326
Look, man, l'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

540
00:48:18,864 --> 00:48:21,196
Yeah.

541
00:48:25,737 --> 00:48:28,331
- [ Door Opening, Closing ]
- [ Whispering ] Yeah.

542
00:48:28,406 --> 00:48:31,933
[ Gideon ] l got stabbed!
l shot the son of a bitch!

543
00:48:32,010 --> 00:48:35,138
l watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

544
00:48:35,213 --> 00:48:38,273
And then my business
gets blown up real good.

545
00:48:38,350 --> 00:48:41,581
- Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

546
00:48:41,653 --> 00:48:44,178
l saw him too.
He had a guitar.

547
00:48:44,256 --> 00:48:48,693
He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

548
00:48:48,760 --> 00:48:53,788
He winked at ya?
Musicians.

549
00:48:53,865 --> 00:48:56,333
- What else did you see?
- So far l haven't heard...

550
00:48:56,401 --> 00:48:58,892
shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

551
00:48:58,970 --> 00:49:04,499
What do l get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

552
00:49:04,576 --> 00:49:07,340
You ain't lost everything.

553
00:49:07,412 --> 00:49:12,509
Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

554
00:49:12,584 --> 00:49:16,179
Fair enough. Catch.

555
00:49:17,289 --> 00:49:19,723
Aah! Jesus.

556
00:49:19,791 --> 00:49:22,225
Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

557
00:49:22,294 --> 00:49:24,285
What're you tellin' me,
this thing is real?

558
00:49:24,362 --> 00:49:28,025
All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

559
00:49:28,099 --> 00:49:32,058
Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

560
00:49:32,137 --> 00:49:36,267
You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

561
00:49:36,341 --> 00:49:39,003
Yeah.

562
00:49:39,077 --> 00:49:44,242
Eyes see. lt's one of the most important
things l learned from my sister.

563
00:49:44,316 --> 00:49:47,581
Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? [ Laughing ]

564
00:49:47,652 --> 00:49:50,985
My father's daughter.
That's right.

565
00:49:51,056 --> 00:49:54,253
What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

566
00:49:54,326 --> 00:49:56,590
Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

567
00:49:56,661 --> 00:50:00,156
With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

568
00:50:00,289 --> 00:50:03,747
He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

569
00:50:03,826 --> 00:50:07,227
He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

570
00:50:07,296 --> 00:50:09,526
Whatever the fuck that means.

571
00:50:09,599 --> 00:50:13,365
Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

572
00:50:14,470 --> 00:50:16,529
Want to relax
that thing now?

573
00:50:16,606 --> 00:50:21,270
This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

574
00:50:21,344 --> 00:50:25,713
You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?

575
00:50:25,782 --> 00:50:28,478
l ain't makin' all this up.

576
00:50:28,551 --> 00:50:33,079
l ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

577
00:50:34,857 --> 00:50:36,984
All right.

578
00:50:41,631 --> 00:50:46,659
A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

579
00:50:46,736 --> 00:50:50,399
Yeah. [ Laughing ]

580
00:50:56,913 --> 00:50:59,905
For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

581
00:51:06,856 --> 00:51:09,154
Thanks.

582
00:51:09,225 --> 00:51:11,523
Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

583
00:51:11,594 --> 00:51:14,188
A big one.

584
00:51:14,263 --> 00:51:19,132
Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

585
00:51:19,202 --> 00:51:23,138
l'll have the janitor
come on up.

586
00:51:27,577 --> 00:51:29,738
[ Purring ]

587
00:51:29,812 --> 00:51:34,715
** [ Electric Guitar ]

588
00:51:46,195 --> 00:51:49,995
[ Siren Wailing ]

589
00:52:19,228 --> 00:52:24,825
- ** [ Rock Playing ]
- [ Crow Caws ]

590
00:52:24,901 --> 00:52:27,165
You again.

591
00:52:27,236 --> 00:52:29,602
You lost or hungry?

592
00:52:29,672 --> 00:52:32,470
- Hi.
- [ Caws ]

593
00:52:34,810 --> 00:52:36,744
* lt can't rain all the time *

594
00:52:36,812 --> 00:52:41,340
[ Skipping ]
* Can't rain all the time *

595
00:52:50,426 --> 00:52:53,122
[ T-bird ] l don't know how many times l
gotta tell you. We're in this together!

596
00:52:53,195 --> 00:52:56,130
One part falls, it all falls!

597
00:52:56,198 --> 00:52:59,656
- You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

598
00:52:59,735 --> 00:53:02,295
That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fuckin' voodoo doll!

599
00:53:02,371 --> 00:53:04,464
Tin Tin was a dick.

600
00:53:04,540 --> 00:53:07,532
Tin Tin.
Sheesh.

601
00:53:07,610 --> 00:53:11,808
Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

602
00:53:11,881 --> 00:53:13,815
Fire it up!

603
00:53:16,385 --> 00:53:18,478
No Funboy.

604
00:53:18,554 --> 00:53:22,490
Probably still...
bangin' away on Darla.

605
00:53:22,558 --> 00:53:25,493
- [ Grunting ]
- [ Whistles ]

606
00:53:27,863 --> 00:53:30,957
Smokes and road beers.
Be quick.

607
00:53:31,033 --> 00:53:33,024
l'm on it.

608
00:53:38,608 --> 00:53:43,910
[ Man Talking On Phone ]

609
00:53:43,980 --> 00:53:46,949
[ Sighs ]

610
00:53:51,153 --> 00:53:53,587
[ Cawing ]

611
00:54:03,699 --> 00:54:07,260
What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

612
00:54:07,336 --> 00:54:11,966
- [ Cawing ]
- l'm your passenger.

613
00:54:18,881 --> 00:54:21,008
Drive.

614
00:54:23,119 --> 00:54:26,054
[ Motor Starts ]

615
00:54:26,122 --> 00:54:27,919
What's all this
happy horseshit?

616
00:54:27,990 --> 00:54:30,117
- [ Tires Screeching ]
- Hey, T-bird! T-bird!

617
00:54:30,192 --> 00:54:33,457
- [ Horn Honking ]
- [ Screams ]

618
00:54:33,529 --> 00:54:35,463
[ Brakes Screeching ]

619
00:54:35,531 --> 00:54:38,796
- Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

620
00:54:38,868 --> 00:54:42,861
Stupid asshair!
You hit my car!

621
00:54:42,938 --> 00:54:45,168
[ Groaning ]

622
00:54:49,845 --> 00:54:54,282
What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? l got it.

623
00:54:55,885 --> 00:54:58,786
We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

624
00:54:58,854 --> 00:55:01,948
- This is business, right?
- [ Gun Cocks ] Faster.

625
00:55:04,894 --> 00:55:09,092
You got that cream stuff?

626
00:55:09,165 --> 00:55:11,565
l hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

627
00:55:13,169 --> 00:55:16,138
- What in the crap--
- [ Tires Screech, Siren Wails ]

628
00:55:16,205 --> 00:55:18,400
[ Screaming ]

629
00:55:19,642 --> 00:55:22,475
Oh, look. Makin' us popular.

630
00:55:22,545 --> 00:55:25,241
When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

631
00:55:25,314 --> 00:55:30,752
[ Siren Wailing ]

632
00:55:30,820 --> 00:55:33,812
This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

633
00:55:36,325 --> 00:55:38,486
Turn.

634
00:55:39,829 --> 00:55:42,593
You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

635
00:55:42,665 --> 00:55:46,999
- Right? Huh?
- [ Crow Cawing ]

636
00:55:48,571 --> 00:55:51,039
[ Groans ]
Damn! Dead end!

637
00:55:51,107 --> 00:55:53,337
[ Cawing ]

638
00:55:56,445 --> 00:55:58,913
- [ Man ] Look out!
- [ Woman Screams ]

639
00:56:02,218 --> 00:56:04,448
Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

640
00:56:15,531 --> 00:56:19,797
- [ Engine Rattling ]
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

641
00:56:19,869 --> 00:56:23,396
[ Siren Wailing ]

642
00:56:23,472 --> 00:56:25,940
Shit! Shit!

643
00:56:33,082 --> 00:56:36,779
Oh, l hate this.
This ain't good.

644
00:56:38,220 --> 00:56:41,678
T-bird!
l got you, man!

645
00:56:41,757 --> 00:56:44,157
- Shit!
- [ Screaming ]

646
00:56:47,930 --> 00:56:52,958
[ Groaning, Car Door Chiming ]

647
00:56:57,540 --> 00:56:59,838
[ T-bird ] Remember?
Yeah, l remember everything.

648
00:56:59,909 --> 00:57:03,140
But l don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

649
00:57:03,212 --> 00:57:05,976
What are you talkin' about?
No, no, no, no, no.

650
00:57:06,048 --> 00:57:09,142
You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, l remember her.

651
00:57:09,218 --> 00:57:11,379
We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

652
00:57:11,453 --> 00:57:14,718
She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

653
00:57:14,790 --> 00:57:18,385
And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

654
00:57:18,460 --> 00:57:21,896
into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

655
00:57:21,964 --> 00:57:25,229
lt's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

656
00:57:25,301 --> 00:57:30,204
What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

657
00:57:31,807 --> 00:57:33,672
Did you send us
these complaints?

658
00:57:35,377 --> 00:57:38,710
Come here!
''Abashed the devil stood.''

659
00:57:38,781 --> 00:57:41,147
Does it get you sweaty?

660
00:57:41,217 --> 00:57:46,416
l know you. l know you.
l knew l knew you.

661
00:57:46,488 --> 00:57:50,579
l knew l knew you.
But you ain't you.

662
00:57:50,712 --> 00:57:54,671
You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

663
00:57:54,750 --> 00:57:58,186
This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

664
00:57:58,253 --> 00:58:00,619
We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

665
00:58:00,689 --> 00:58:05,149
[ Grunting, Muttering ]
T-bird--

666
00:58:05,227 --> 00:58:08,196
There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!

667
00:58:10,766 --> 00:58:14,930
- T-bird.
- [ T-bird Panting ]

668
00:58:15,003 --> 00:58:18,370
- [ Engine Revs ]
- ''Abashed the devil stood...

669
00:58:18,440 --> 00:58:21,375
and felt how awful goodness is.''

670
00:58:21,443 --> 00:58:24,344
''And felt how awful goodness is.''

671
00:58:29,084 --> 00:58:33,077
[ Tires Squealing ]

672
00:58:38,393 --> 00:58:40,987
[ Gasping ]
T-bird. T-bird.

673
00:59:08,724 --> 00:59:12,023
[ Crow Caws ]

674
00:59:31,346 --> 00:59:33,644
[ Woman ] This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

675
00:59:33,715 --> 00:59:36,047
For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

676
00:59:36,118 --> 00:59:40,487
has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, ''Devil's Night''...

677
00:59:40,555 --> 00:59:43,991
the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

678
00:59:44,059 --> 00:59:49,429
Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

679
00:59:49,498 --> 00:59:54,663
Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

680
00:59:54,736 --> 00:59:58,365
The mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties--

681
00:59:58,440 --> 01:00:02,240
Do you like them up or over?
l can't remember.

682
01:00:04,279 --> 01:00:07,009
What are you doing?
l don't even like eggs.

683
01:00:07,082 --> 01:00:12,019
- Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when l was five.

684
01:00:12,087 --> 01:00:16,217
So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

685
01:00:16,291 --> 01:00:19,624
So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

686
01:00:19,695 --> 01:00:24,792
Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

687
01:00:24,866 --> 01:00:30,634
- Who?
- Oh, it was nuts.

688
01:00:30,706 --> 01:00:35,939
You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

689
01:00:38,447 --> 01:00:42,747
Oh, forget it. l never was
too good at this mommy shit.

690
01:00:42,818 --> 01:00:45,013
Over easy.

691
01:00:47,122 --> 01:00:51,821
l like 'em
over easy... Mom.

692
01:01:02,404 --> 01:01:04,668
Hey, Albrecht.

693
01:01:04,740 --> 01:01:07,334
[ Sighs ]

694
01:01:07,409 --> 01:01:10,344
This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

695
01:01:10,412 --> 01:01:13,677
We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

696
01:01:13,749 --> 01:01:17,981
- We're gonna have to l.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

697
01:01:18,053 --> 01:01:19,987
Arson was his specialty.

698
01:01:20,055 --> 01:01:22,023
Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

699
01:01:22,090 --> 01:01:26,026
- Case closed.
- Bull-fuckin'-shit.

700
01:01:26,094 --> 01:01:28,358
Come here.

701
01:01:32,100 --> 01:01:34,091
You're holding out on me.

702
01:01:34,169 --> 01:01:37,696
l got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

703
01:01:37,773 --> 01:01:41,038
and you're covering up
for somebody.

704
01:01:41,109 --> 01:01:43,543
Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

705
01:01:43,612 --> 01:01:47,514
- You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

706
01:01:47,582 --> 01:01:49,709
Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

707
01:01:49,785 --> 01:01:52,652
who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

708
01:01:52,721 --> 01:01:55,690
Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

709
01:01:55,757 --> 01:01:57,691
and you're saying this is
just a fuckin' automobile accident?

710
01:01:57,759 --> 01:02:00,057
- Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

711
01:02:00,128 --> 01:02:02,153
l didn't want to interrupt you.
lt sounded good.

712
01:02:02,230 --> 01:02:04,198
You gotta write that shit down.

713
01:02:04,266 --> 01:02:06,200
All right, smart-ass.

714
01:02:06,268 --> 01:02:09,328
The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

715
01:02:09,404 --> 01:02:13,340
- Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

716
01:02:13,408 --> 01:02:17,139
- For what?
- Misconduct.

717
01:02:17,212 --> 01:02:21,239
[ Dials Phone ]
Yeah, give me the lab.

718
01:02:21,316 --> 01:02:25,912
[ Thunder Rumbling ]

719
01:02:36,164 --> 01:02:38,098
[ Grunting ]

720
01:03:04,292 --> 01:03:08,194
** [ Electric Guitar ]

721
01:03:11,967 --> 01:03:14,561
[ Shelly ] One for sorrow,
two for joy...

722
01:03:14,636 --> 01:03:17,469
- Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.

723
01:03:22,511 --> 01:03:26,311
Dancing--

724
01:03:36,558 --> 01:03:39,288
[ Paper Ripping ]

725
01:03:57,445 --> 01:03:59,379
Eric?

726
01:03:59,447 --> 01:04:02,041
[ Rain Falling ]

727
01:04:02,117 --> 01:04:06,383
[ Sighs ] Man, Sarah,
you're going crazy.

728
01:04:06,454 --> 01:04:09,389
- Gabriel.
- [ Meows ]

729
01:04:09,457 --> 01:04:12,221
l thought you were dead.

730
01:04:12,294 --> 01:04:15,559
You're not dead, are you?

731
01:04:40,322 --> 01:04:43,257
l knew it was you.

732
01:04:45,160 --> 01:04:48,095
Even with the makeup.

733
01:04:52,934 --> 01:04:55,528
l remembered your song.

734
01:04:55,604 --> 01:04:59,370
You said,
''Can't rain all the time.''

735
01:04:59,441 --> 01:05:02,706
That is from your song, right?

736
01:05:12,621 --> 01:05:15,749
- [ Cawing ]
- Come on, Eric. l know you're here.

737
01:05:18,126 --> 01:05:22,222
l miss you...
and Shelly.

738
01:05:25,300 --> 01:05:28,736
Get so lonely
all by myself.

739
01:05:30,605 --> 01:05:35,235
The hell with you.
l thought you cared.

740
01:05:35,310 --> 01:05:38,438
Sarah, l do care.

741
01:05:49,646 --> 01:05:51,773
That's him.
That's him!

742
01:05:51,849 --> 01:05:55,182
But he looked different. He was painted
up white like some kind of dead whore.

743
01:05:55,252 --> 01:05:58,517
l seen him. T-bird sent me in
for some road beers, right?

744
01:05:58,589 --> 01:06:01,149
Then he took him away.
But l chased him down.

745
01:06:01,225 --> 01:06:04,023
And he flash fried T-bird
to his fuckin' car!

746
01:06:04,094 --> 01:06:07,621
Aw, T-bird!
Here's to you, buddy.

747
01:06:07,698 --> 01:06:11,634
Maybe we oughta just videotape this.
Play it back in slow motion.

748
01:06:12,936 --> 01:06:17,532
- Fire it up! Fire it up!
- You see the grave?

749
01:06:17,608 --> 01:06:20,202
- Empty.
- Fire it--

750
01:06:20,277 --> 01:06:22,211
Grave?
What grave?

751
01:06:22,279 --> 01:06:24,509
What about
my fuckin' grave?

752
01:06:24,581 --> 01:06:25,912
- [ Screams ]
- Three out of four.

753
01:06:25,983 --> 01:06:29,248
He's working his way back
to this speed freak right here.

754
01:06:29,319 --> 01:06:31,981
lt's not fair.
lt's Funboy's fault.

755
01:06:32,055 --> 01:06:35,218
That boy was out of control.
T-bird, he came in, he says...
[ Whistles ]

756
01:06:35,292 --> 01:06:38,591
...''Waste them both.'' And now
this ghost gonna kill my ass next!

757
01:06:38,662 --> 01:06:42,564
[ Groaning ]

758
01:06:42,633 --> 01:06:45,727
This ghost gonna
kill my ass next.

759
01:06:45,803 --> 01:06:49,569
- This ghost gonna kill--
- Hey.

760
01:06:49,640 --> 01:06:51,608
That ain't no ghost.

761
01:06:53,510 --> 01:06:56,673
- They have all arrived.
- Watch him.

762
01:06:56,747 --> 01:06:58,738
We might need him.

763
01:07:00,250 --> 01:07:02,684
Ghost gonna kill my--

764
01:07:15,432 --> 01:07:19,368
He like his plain
or with onions?

765
01:07:19,436 --> 01:07:22,872
Fine.
Don't talk to me.

766
01:07:22,940 --> 01:07:27,036
When someone's dead,
they can't come back, can they?

767
01:07:27,110 --> 01:07:29,704
That's what l thought.

768
01:07:29,780 --> 01:07:32,544
Are you referring
to anyone in particular?

769
01:07:32,616 --> 01:07:34,880
You'll just think
l'm nuts.

770
01:07:34,952 --> 01:07:38,547
Yeah, well, then maybe
they'll have to lock us both up.

771
01:07:38,622 --> 01:07:43,992
- You see him too?
- l saw somebody.

772
01:07:44,061 --> 01:07:47,553
Maybe it was
your fairy godfather.

773
01:07:47,631 --> 01:07:50,566
Eric didn't come back for me.

774
01:07:50,634 --> 01:07:55,401
He can't be my friend anymore
because l'm alive.

775
01:07:55,472 --> 01:07:58,669
You want a friend
to walk you home?

776
01:07:58,742 --> 01:08:03,975
** [ Electric Guitar ]

777
01:08:29,172 --> 01:08:32,164
- [ Screaming ]
- * l am the wicked
l am the wave of the future *

778
01:08:45,255 --> 01:08:47,189
[ Woman ] * Being crucified *

779
01:08:47,257 --> 01:08:51,557
* You things, things
things of the flesh *

780
01:08:51,628 --> 01:08:54,324
* Do it slow *

781
01:08:54,398 --> 01:08:58,698
* Down avenues ''cut me'' *

782
01:08:58,769 --> 01:09:02,466
* Lust my eyes *

783
01:09:02,539 --> 01:09:08,808
* Licking lips encouraging
Mr. Careworn *

784
01:09:08,879 --> 01:09:15,011
* To gaze upon the screen bask on *

785
01:09:15,085 --> 01:09:17,110
* After the flesh **

786
01:09:29,099 --> 01:09:32,694
[ Whimpering ]

787
01:09:32,769 --> 01:09:35,704
Boys.

788
01:09:35,772 --> 01:09:39,208
lt seems our friend T-bird won't be
joining us this evening...

789
01:09:39,276 --> 01:09:41,369
on account of
a slight case of death.

790
01:09:41,445 --> 01:09:43,413
- [ Men Chuckling ]
- You wanna sit down?

791
01:09:43,480 --> 01:09:48,850
- [ Groaning ]
- Well, well, well.

792
01:09:48,919 --> 01:09:51,979
Devil's Night is
upon us again.

793
01:09:52,055 --> 01:09:53,989
l thought we'd throw
a little party...

794
01:09:54,057 --> 01:09:57,322
start a bunch of fires,
make a little profit.

795
01:09:57,394 --> 01:09:59,624
l like the pretty lights.

796
01:09:59,696 --> 01:10:02,563
[ Laughing ]

797
01:10:02,632 --> 01:10:06,534
Problem is, it's all been done before.
You see what l'm saying?

798
01:10:06,603 --> 01:10:11,802
- That's no reason to quit.
- Wrong. Best reason to quit.

799
01:10:11,875 --> 01:10:14,275
Only reason to quit.

800
01:10:14,344 --> 01:10:19,839
A man has an idea.

801
01:10:19,916 --> 01:10:22,180
The idea attracts others...

802
01:10:22,252 --> 01:10:24,345
like-minded.

803
01:10:24,421 --> 01:10:26,514
The idea expands.

804
01:10:26,590 --> 01:10:30,253
The idea becomes
an institution.

805
01:10:30,327 --> 01:10:32,989
What was the idea?

806
01:10:33,063 --> 01:10:36,829
See, that's what's
been bothering me, boys.

807
01:10:36,900 --> 01:10:39,698
But l'll tell ya, when l used
to think about the idea itself...

808
01:10:39,770 --> 01:10:42,864
it'd put a big old smile on my face.

809
01:10:42,939 --> 01:10:45,134
You see, gentlemen...

810
01:10:45,208 --> 01:10:50,202
greed is for amateurs.

811
01:10:50,280 --> 01:10:55,479
Disorder, chaos, anarchy...

812
01:10:55,552 --> 01:10:58,146
now that's fun!

813
01:10:58,221 --> 01:11:00,519
- What about Devil's Night?
- What about it?

814
01:11:00,590 --> 01:11:03,991
l started the first fires
in this goddamn city.

815
01:11:04,061 --> 01:11:07,155
Before l knew it, every charlatan
and shitheel was imitating me.

816
01:11:07,230 --> 01:11:10,666
Do you know
what they got now?

817
01:11:10,734 --> 01:11:15,000
Devil's Night greeting cards.

818
01:11:15,072 --> 01:11:18,007
lsn't that precious?

819
01:11:18,075 --> 01:11:20,168
Yeah.

820
01:11:20,243 --> 01:11:25,010
The idea has become
the institution, boys.

821
01:11:25,082 --> 01:11:27,107
Time to move along.

822
01:11:27,184 --> 01:11:29,618
You don't want us to do
''Light My Fire'' time for the whole city?

823
01:11:29,686 --> 01:11:32,177
No.

824
01:11:32,255 --> 01:11:34,849
No, l want you to set
a fire so goddamn big...

825
01:11:34,925 --> 01:11:38,019
the gods will notice us again.
That's what l'm saying.

826
01:11:38,095 --> 01:11:40,689
l want all of you boys to be able
to look me straight in the eye...

827
01:11:40,764 --> 01:11:45,201
one more time and say,
''Are we having fun or what?''

828
01:11:45,268 --> 01:11:47,361
- Hey, you! What's your name?
- Huh?

829
01:11:47,437 --> 01:11:49,371
Skank!
You don't feel that?

830
01:11:49,439 --> 01:11:52,738
- l feel like a little worm
on a big fuckin' hook.
- [ All Laughing ]

831
01:11:52,809 --> 01:11:55,209
''l feel like a little worm
on a big fuckin' hook.''

832
01:11:55,278 --> 01:11:59,681
Well, boy, your mama
must be damn proud of you!

833
01:11:59,749 --> 01:12:02,081
- [ Crow Caws ]
- [ Gasps ]

834
01:12:02,152 --> 01:12:04,780
How the hell did
that thing get in here?

835
01:12:06,177 --> 01:12:08,668
- Gentlemen.
- [ Skank Screams ]

836
01:12:08,747 --> 01:12:13,377
[ Skank Whimpering ] Let me go!
Let me go! l gotta go!

837
01:12:17,956 --> 01:12:21,722
You're him, huh?
The avenger.

838
01:12:21,793 --> 01:12:24,284
The killer of killers.

839
01:12:24,362 --> 01:12:27,195
- Nice outfit.
- [ Whimpering ]

840
01:12:27,265 --> 01:12:29,324
l'm not sure
about the face though.

841
01:12:29,401 --> 01:12:31,460
l just want him.

842
01:12:31,536 --> 01:12:34,972
- [ Whimpering ]
- Well, you can't have him.

843
01:12:35,040 --> 01:12:37,702
Well...

844
01:12:39,778 --> 01:12:42,246
l see you have
made your decision.

845
01:12:43,815 --> 01:12:45,806
Now let's see you enforce it.

846
01:12:45,884 --> 01:12:49,547
Aw, this is already boring the shit
out of me. Kill him!

847
01:12:55,427 --> 01:12:59,363
Ooh, that had to hurt.

848
01:12:59,431 --> 01:13:02,229
- [ All Laughing ]
- Well, that's that.

849
01:13:02,300 --> 01:13:05,463
- [ Laughing Continues ]
- That guy was crazy.

850
01:13:07,806 --> 01:13:10,639
[ Caws ]

851
01:13:12,110 --> 01:13:13,907
He's gone.
[ Screams ]

852
01:13:13,978 --> 01:13:19,644
[ Screaming, Gunfire ]

853
01:13:21,953 --> 01:13:23,648
Get him!

854
01:13:29,127 --> 01:13:32,563
- [ Whimpering ]
- [ Gunfire ]

855
01:13:40,939 --> 01:13:43,703
Right here! Here, help me!
He's gonna kill me!

856
01:13:47,779 --> 01:13:49,770
Jesus Christ!

857
01:14:06,197 --> 01:14:08,165
Hey!

858
01:14:40,665 --> 01:14:42,997
You're all going to die.

859
01:14:54,412 --> 01:14:57,939
[ Screaming ]

860
01:14:58,016 --> 01:15:00,849
[ Man ] Get the fuck outta here!

861
01:15:13,131 --> 01:15:15,691
[ Crowd Screaming ]

862
01:15:15,767 --> 01:15:21,262
[ Whimpering, Gasping ]

863
01:15:25,877 --> 01:15:30,837
[ Whimpering ]

864
01:15:30,915 --> 01:15:32,405
[ Screams ]

865
01:15:36,621 --> 01:15:39,556
Guess it's not a good day
to be a bad guy, huh, Skank?

866
01:15:39,624 --> 01:15:42,855
l'm not Skank.
There's Skank right there.

867
01:15:42,927 --> 01:15:46,829
- Skank's dead.
- That's right.

868
01:15:46,898 --> 01:15:48,695
[ Screaming ] No!

869
01:15:48,766 --> 01:15:53,226
[ Whimpering ]

870
01:15:53,304 --> 01:15:56,967
- [ Body Crashing ]
- What in the crap--

871
01:15:58,309 --> 01:16:00,937
- Don't move!
- Hold it!

872
01:16:01,012 --> 01:16:04,448
That's all she wrote!
Move and we shoot!

873
01:16:11,322 --> 01:16:13,483
[ Siren Blaring ]

874
01:16:13,558 --> 01:16:16,425
You are surrounded by police units.
Do not attempt to escape.

875
01:16:16,494 --> 01:16:19,793
[ Gunfire Continues ]

876
01:16:19,864 --> 01:16:23,493
- Stop running immediately.
- Holy shit!

877
01:16:23,568 --> 01:16:25,695
...arms and legs--

878
01:16:31,276 --> 01:16:36,043
Stop immediately.
Lie down, spread your arms and legs--

879
01:17:16,688 --> 01:17:21,318
- [ Tires Screeching ]
- Come on! Move it!

880
01:17:25,730 --> 01:17:28,858
My advice:
Next time duck.

881
01:17:30,902 --> 01:17:33,268
So many cops, you'd think
they were giving away donuts.

882
01:17:33,338 --> 01:17:36,671
- [ Sirens Wailing ]
- [ Brakes Screeching ]

883
01:17:36,741 --> 01:17:39,835
- Shit!
- [ Door Opening ]

884
01:17:42,747 --> 01:17:45,648
Oh. l knew you
were gonna do that.

885
01:17:45,717 --> 01:17:48,185
Look at that out there.

886
01:17:48,252 --> 01:17:51,187
The whole city oughta be
in flames by now.

887
01:17:51,255 --> 01:17:54,452
Sky oughta be red.

888
01:17:54,525 --> 01:17:58,859
So that, l take it,
is the late, great Eric Draven.

889
01:17:58,930 --> 01:18:04,630
He has power, but it is power
you can take from him.

890
01:18:04,702 --> 01:18:07,671
- l like him already.
- The crow...

891
01:18:07,739 --> 01:18:12,233
is his link between
the land of the living...

892
01:18:12,310 --> 01:18:14,642
and the realm of the dead.

893
01:18:14,712 --> 01:18:19,240
So, kill the crow
and destroy the man.

894
01:18:19,317 --> 01:18:21,285
Hmm.

895
01:18:44,409 --> 01:18:46,400
l'm coming home, Shelly.

896
01:18:46,477 --> 01:18:48,672
[ Laughing ]

897
01:18:48,746 --> 01:18:54,446
[ Laughing Continues ]

898
01:18:54,519 --> 01:18:56,487
[ Chuckles ]

899
01:19:00,758 --> 01:19:04,956
[ Children Laughing, Hooting ]

900
01:19:05,029 --> 01:19:09,295
[ Laughing ]

901
01:19:35,493 --> 01:19:37,927
You're gonna say
l shouldn't be in the cemetery...

902
01:19:37,995 --> 01:19:40,054
in the middle
of the night, right?

903
01:19:40,131 --> 01:19:41,894
Safest place in the world to be.

904
01:19:41,966 --> 01:19:46,733
lt's 'cause everybody's dead.
l knew you'd come here.

905
01:19:46,804 --> 01:19:50,968
lt's really late, Sarah.

906
01:19:51,042 --> 01:19:53,804
You didn't say good-bye.

907
01:19:53,937 --> 01:19:57,896
You're just gonna have
to forgive me for that.

908
01:19:57,975 --> 01:20:02,207
And you're never coming back.

909
01:20:08,519 --> 01:20:11,750
l gave this to Shelly once.

910
01:20:15,492 --> 01:20:18,427
l think she'd like you
to have it.

911
01:20:22,499 --> 01:20:24,763
This way you'll
always remember her.

912
01:20:24,835 --> 01:20:27,395
l'll never take it off.

913
01:20:45,556 --> 01:20:49,390
l better go sneak
back in the house.

914
01:20:55,499 --> 01:20:57,467
Bye.

915
01:21:17,454 --> 01:21:20,287
- [ Muffled Screaming ]
- Shh! Shh!

916
01:21:22,192 --> 01:21:24,592
Shh. Take it easy, sweetheart.

917
01:21:24,661 --> 01:21:29,462
[ Muffled Screaming Continues ]

918
01:21:31,535 --> 01:21:34,003
Come on.
Come on.

919
01:21:47,284 --> 01:21:51,414
What is that? Some sort of souvenir
there from your pal?

920
01:21:53,023 --> 01:21:56,117
l'll just keep it for good luck.
What do you say, hmm?

921
01:22:02,566 --> 01:22:05,865
Her eyes are so innocent.

922
01:22:17,214 --> 01:22:19,148
- [ Sarah ] Eric!
- [ Caws ]

923
01:22:19,216 --> 01:22:23,175
Eric, help! Eric!

924
01:22:26,757 --> 01:22:29,851
[ Thunderclap ]

925
01:22:31,895 --> 01:22:33,829
[ Crow Caws ]

926
01:22:47,778 --> 01:22:49,973
[ Crow Flapping, Caws ]

927
01:23:02,593 --> 01:23:05,824
Quick impression for ya.

928
01:23:05,896 --> 01:23:09,627
Caw! Caw! Bang!
Fuck, l'm dead!

929
01:23:09,700 --> 01:23:13,033
Give me the girl
and l'll let you walk out of here.

930
01:23:13,103 --> 01:23:16,163
[ lnhales ]
Well, well.

931
01:23:16,240 --> 01:23:20,006
Why don't you just give me a minute
to think about that, huh?

932
01:23:24,448 --> 01:23:26,882
[ Cawing ]

933
01:23:27,951 --> 01:23:30,249
Nah. Fuck it.

934
01:23:36,260 --> 01:23:38,626
[ Chuckles ]

935
01:23:38,695 --> 01:23:40,856
Aw, fuck.

936
01:23:44,067 --> 01:23:48,026
[ Muffled Screaming ]

937
01:23:48,105 --> 01:23:52,633
Well, well, well. lt does seem to me
that our little life has undergone...

938
01:23:52,709 --> 01:23:56,577
a rather significant change in the past
few minutes now. Wouldn't you agree?

939
01:23:56,647 --> 01:24:00,811
[ Groaning ]

940
01:24:00,884 --> 01:24:04,285
Well, for a ghost,
you bleed just fine.

941
01:24:07,824 --> 01:24:10,088
- lt's still alive.
- Well, then kill it!

942
01:24:11,728 --> 01:24:13,958
Bye-bye, birdie.

943
01:24:59,042 --> 01:25:01,135
Ah, shit.

944
01:25:01,211 --> 01:25:03,304
Well, just came by
to pay my respects...

945
01:25:03,380 --> 01:25:05,405
and here you are
getting all shot up again.

946
01:25:05,482 --> 01:25:08,076
- They've taken Sarah.
- How many?

947
01:25:08,151 --> 01:25:10,142
Two more.
[ Groans ]

948
01:25:10,220 --> 01:25:12,211
l can handle it.
Don't worry.

949
01:25:12,289 --> 01:25:14,814
l'm not worried.
Look, here's the plan.

950
01:25:14,891 --> 01:25:17,655
You stay in front, and when they
run out of ammo, l'll arrest 'em.

951
01:25:17,728 --> 01:25:21,459
That sounds like a great plan.
There's just one problem.

952
01:25:24,067 --> 01:25:27,628
Oh, shit.
You're bleeding all over the place.

953
01:25:27,704 --> 01:25:29,763
l thought, you know,
you were invincible.

954
01:25:29,840 --> 01:25:33,298
l was.
l'm not anymore.

955
01:25:33,377 --> 01:25:37,609
[ Sighs ] Well, l guess you really will
need my help, won't you?

956
01:25:37,681 --> 01:25:40,582
- Come on.
- [ Groaning ]

957
01:25:43,253 --> 01:25:45,312
You take that.

958
01:26:15,385 --> 01:26:18,843
- You were supposed to stay behind me.
- l think l messed up.

959
01:26:40,977 --> 01:26:42,877
[ Crow Caws ]

960
01:26:42,946 --> 01:26:46,177
This is all the power
you ever had.

961
01:26:46,249 --> 01:26:48,342
Now it is mine.

962
01:26:48,418 --> 01:26:52,115
Pity there's not more time...

963
01:26:52,189 --> 01:26:54,817
- [ Gun Cocks ]
- ...for us.

964
01:26:56,259 --> 01:27:01,993
[ Woman Screaming ]

965
01:27:03,667 --> 01:27:07,603
[ Screaming ]

966
01:27:08,905 --> 01:27:12,864
[ Screaming Continues ]

967
01:27:12,943 --> 01:27:15,810
[ Sarah ] Help, Eric!
l'm scared!

968
01:27:17,914 --> 01:27:20,474
Let me go!

969
01:27:29,559 --> 01:27:33,086
Let her go!

970
01:27:33,163 --> 01:27:36,068
You can have me.
l won't fight you.

971
01:27:36,068 --> 01:27:37,763
You can have me.
l won't fight you.

972
01:27:37,836 --> 01:27:39,827
All right.

973
01:27:39,905 --> 01:27:41,930
- [ Sarah Screams ]
- No!

974
01:27:45,744 --> 01:27:51,080
[ Gasping, Groaning ]

975
01:27:53,352 --> 01:27:55,411
[ Crow Caws ]

976
01:27:55,487 --> 01:27:57,853
[ Thunderclap ]

977
01:27:57,923 --> 01:28:00,255
[ Gasping ]

978
01:28:00,326 --> 01:28:02,453
- [ Thunderclap ]
- [ Screams ]

979
01:28:22,114 --> 01:28:24,981

You know,

987

till you find him.''

988

What happened back there
with you and your girlfriend--

989

l cleared that building.

990
01:29:19,505 --> 01:29:22,770
Hell, nothing in this town
happens without my say-so.

991
01:29:22,841 --> 01:29:25,708
So l'm sorry if l spoiled
your wedding plans, friend.

992
01:29:25,778 --> 01:29:28,611
But if it's any consolation
to you...

993
01:29:28,680 --> 01:29:32,309
you have put
a smile on my face.

994
01:29:32,384 --> 01:29:35,012
You got a lot
of spirit, son.

995
01:29:35,087 --> 01:29:37,681

l am going to miss you.

996
01:29:37,756 --> 01:29:40,281

to give you.

997
01:29:40,359 --> 01:29:42,759

998
01:29:47,232 --> 01:29:50,258

999
01:29:52,604 --> 01:29:55,300

- [ Groaning ]

1000

01:30:12,224 --> 01:30:15,660

1004
01:30:40,185 --> 01:30:42,449

1005
01:30:44,456 --> 01:30:48,449

God, l need a cigarette.

1006

1007

1008
01:30:58,804 --> 01:31:01,364
What you kept in here
saved me.

1009

- Don't mention it.

1010
01:31:04,643 --> 01:31:07,635
l've been meaning
to come to church anyway.

1011

Oh, yuck.
[ Spits ]

1012
01:31:15,487 --> 01:31:20,481
l'm quitting as of now...

1013

until help comes.

1014
01:31:32,471 --> 01:31:35,929
He'll be okay, right?

1015
01:31:36,008 --> 01:31:38,203
Eric?

1016
